description:
For its final season, The Vampire Diaries plans on bringing back many fan-favorite characters for one last goodbye, so it comes as no surprise that we haven't seen the last of Tyler Lockwood.在《吸血鬼日记》的最后一季，导演组打算把众多观众们喜爱的角色都邀请回来和大家跟大家说再见，，所以看到Tyler Lockwood回归的消息大家应该也不会太惊讶。

Entertainment Weekly reports that Michael Trevino will first appear in the third episode of the upcoming eighth season. And no, it's not so that he can attend his ex Caroline's (Candice King) wedding to Stefan (Paul Wesley) or anything like that. Rather, the episode will find Tyler reuniting with Damon (Ian Somerhalder) .《娱乐周刊》报道，Michael Trevino将会成为第八季首位回归的演员，他将会在第八季第三集回归。然而他的回归并不是为了回来参加前女友Caroline和Stefan的婚礼，而是回来找Damon。

The Vampire Diaries returns Friday, Oct. 21 at 8/7c on the CW.《吸血鬼日记》第八季将会在10月21日回归CW电视台。

title: 狼人Tyler回归《吸血鬼日记》第八季
